title: Date cake
ingredients: ['175g plain flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '200g butter', '4 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '120ml milk', '175g dates, pitted and chopped (I use dates that are sold ready for baking)', '60g slivered or chopped almonds', '60g walnuts, chopped']
